article_title: Euro Weakens on ECB’s Dovish Tone
article_text:
ECB president Mario Draghi is setting off with a dovish tone, “both on inflation and growth,” says Vasileios Gkionakis, head of currency strategy at UniCredit. The euro is now 0.4% down against the dollar, trading at 1.1175.

Write to Chiara Albanese at chiara.albanese@wsj.com...
